entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 10:45 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SSE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 800 metres before morning. Fog patches. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 800 metres rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
